create table if not exists formula ( id varchar(36) not null primary key, formula varchar(1000) null );
create table if not exists sensor ( name varchar(100) not null primary key, location varchar(100) null, description varchar(500) null, value double null, unit varchar(36) null, simulation_code varchar(1000) null, created_at timestamp null );
